examinables.script: pr Guitar got on fire ... (hi py)

gotoif i_colias_showed was_here
gotoif i_colias_quit was_here

pr There's someone behind this.
char colias
cp Yoo... I been caught...
pr Hi py
set i_colias_showed 1
return

label was_here
pr Colias was here.

areas.name: Home
areas.script:
music protagonist

gotoif i_colias_quit no_colias
gotoif !i_colias_showed no_colias
char colias
label no_colias

returnif i_got_home
pr (Hi py) Ok we are at home
set i_got_home 1

talks.What are you doing here?:
char colias
pose colias normal
pr Waht are you doing here?
cp Providing a test scenario for py
pr O
pr Go away now
pose colias serious
cp k...
set i_colias_quit 1
char none

examinables.script: pr The door to class. I'm going to stop here, so you can't go in.

areas.name: School
areas.script:
music deid
char deid
open_talk "Hi Professor"

talks.Hi Professor:
pr Hi Professor
dm I cannot do Deid Mann justice on demand like this so pretend he said something cool.
pr Goes for all of us though.
dm True
